description.text:
See PHIL MICKELSON and the best of the PGA TOUR when it returns to Silverado Resort and Spa in Napa, California!  
Just Announced: LIVE MUSIC AFTER GOLF – Admission is included with your golf ticket.
X AMBASSADORS – Thursday, October 13
CHARLES KELLEY – Friday, October 14
THIRD EYE BLIND – Saturday, October 15
(listen to each band at www.safewayopen.com/fanexperience)
Admission to the following on-course venues is also included in the cost of each ticket (more details at SafewayOpen.com)
SAFEWAY FOOD & WINE PAVILION
Over 27,000 square feet of Food and Wine! Enjoy lunch in this giant air conditioned tent, or take your meal outside to one of two viewing decks to watch golf and soak up the sun. This venue will feature the Safeway Culinary Experience, Starbucks and world-renowned chefs Thomas Keller, Masaharu Morimoto and Charlie Palmer all with no cover charge! Pair your meal with a glass of wine, a tasting flight or a beverage from the 360-degree sports bar!
BEER FORE BIRDIES by MICHELOB ULTRA
It’s happy hour on the golf course! Located on the par-5 16th green, Beer for Birdies features discounted beer every time a player makes birdie or eagle on that hole… all day…every day. Cheers!
SPIRITS LOUNGE
In the mood for a specialty cocktail? Watch your favorite players from the 17th hole greenside lounge and enjoy unique concoctions featuring over 10 different spirits brands.
THE BREW LOFT
We brought the brewery to the golf course! Choose from more than a dozen beers on tap while you sit greenside on the exciting par-3 11th hole.
FOOD - Visit the SAFEWAY FOOD & WINE PAVILION featuring gourmet food and world-renowned chefs including THOMAS KELLER, MASAHARU MORIMOTO, CHARLIE PALMER, the Safeway Culinary Experience, and Starbucks. Other food options include Ca’momi Pizza, Compadres Rio Grille, Silverado Burger Dogs, Kara’s Cupcakes and Three Twins Ice Cream.
BEER, WINE and SPIRITS - Thirsty? Buy a glass or enjoy a tasting flight from 60+ premium beer, wine, and spirit brands! See the list at SafewayOpen.com
MUSIC - Live music after golf featuring X Ambassadors, Charles Kelley and Third Eye Blind!
GOLF - The Safeway Open is the first event of the 2016-2017 PGA TOUR FedExCup schedule, October 12-16, 2016, and will host many of the top PGA TOUR players in the world.
15 and Under Free Admission - Free admission for kids 15 and under when accompanied by a paid adult.
Safeway $10 Off Coupon - All ticket purchasers will receive a Safeway $10 off coupon valid in Safeway stores.
Tournament proceeds benefit the Safeway Foundation and local charities. 
Safeway is offering special savings of up to 50% to their ClubCard and Just for U shoppers. Just type in the promocode to receive your discount. (More info at www.Safewayopoen.com)
NO RE-ENTRY | NO RAIN CHECK PRIVILEGES | NO REFUNDS OR EXCHANGES

description.text:
Please click here for full details of BoomTown's Terms & Conditions.
All tickets are non-refundable.
All tickets are issued as E-tickets and are emailed in June 2016. Upon booking, you will be emailed a Booking Confirmation. 
Residency Passes
All BoomTown residency passes are valid from midday on Thursday 11th August to midnight on Sunday 14th August and allow access to all general public spaces and campsites throughout the site.
Please note the only difference between Tier One, Tier Two and Tier Three is the price.
There are no day tickets.
All infants, children and teens must be accompanied by an Adult aged 25 or over. Each adult may accompany two teens or three children. Entry to unaccompanied Children or Teens will be refused at the gate.
Adult tickets may be purchased by persons who will be aged 18 or over on 11th August 2016.
Infant, Child and Teen tickets must only be purchased for persons within the age brackets. Persons will be refused entry into the festival, without refund, should the incorrect ticket be purchased.
Coach & Festival Ticket Packages
Coach travel is offered by National Express. 
Upon booking you will receive an email from Boomtown confirming your purchase.
Your Travel Ticket will be emailed to you from National Express within 5 weeks of booking.
Your Festival Entry Ticket will be emailed to you from Eventbrite in June.
You must present both your Travel Ticket AND Festival Entry Ticket on the coach in order to be validated to receive your festival wristband on arrival. Travel on your chosen coach is mandatory and you will not be granted entry to the festival unless you travel by coach.
You must not book a coach package unless you are certain you will be able to travel on the coach you have selected.
All coach & festival ticket packages are sold as return packages, departing from the location listed on Thursday 11th August. All return legs depart Boomtown on Monday 15th August to the location that you departed from on the outward leg (you cannot return to a different location.)
Please visit www.nationalexpress.com for full booking terms & conditions and details of departure coach stations.
Should you have any questions regarding your booking, please contact National Express Customer Services on 08717 81 81 81.
EcoBond (litter deposit)
Part of the 'Keep BoomTown Tidy' scheme, a £10 deposit is added on to each Adult or Teen ticket and is refunded in cash on site when a bag of rubbish or recycling is handed in to the EcoBond depot. For more details, please click here.
Vehicle Passes
Vehicle passes will be emailed as a separate E-ticket which is exchanged on the gate for a Pass.
Please click for more details about Campervans or Family Parking/Campervans
The Meadow
BoomTown offer a range of facilities for residents with accessibility needs. Please click here for more details.
Reserved Camping
Reserved Campsite bookings do not include tents. You will be allocated a 5m x 7m space in the designated campsite. Should you wish your pitch to be next to other friends that are also booking reserved spaces, please nominate a Group Leader and ensure that all bookers in your group (including you) refer to this person in your booking. For more details about Reserved Camping, please click here
Boomtique Village & Boomtique Residence
For more details about Boomtique, please click here
Lockers
Lockers include a 12v power supply with car charger socket so you can charge your mobile phone. You must bring a charger with the correct 12v adaptor or you can purchase one on site. For more details about Lockers, please click here
Charity Donations
100% of your donation will go to the nominated charity. Please click here for more details about the charities we are working with.
Phone Charging
Option 1: Unlimited phone charging all weekend, provided by Charge Candy. Drop your phone off at any of the Charge Candy stalls whenever it needs charged and the friendly staff will do it all for you. You'll get a ticket, just bring it back and say hello to your lovely charged up mobile.
Option 2: You get one fully charged portable charger each day, with enough power to fully charge one smartphone. A £20 deposit is payable on collection and this will be refunded when you return the charger at the end of the festival.
Zooloos
A zooloos wristband will give you access to lovely hot showers, fancy flushing loos and a pamper area with hairdryers, straigheners and mirrors. Use the areas as many times as you wish over the weekend. Please note so we can manage resources and keep queues to a minimum, you can only use the showers at whichever location you have booked (HillTop, Downtown or Wild West), but you CAN use the loos and pamper areas at any location.

description.text:
SoulFuelwv is a three-day Christian Music and Family Festival that will feature top national and regional talent, dynamic motivational speakers, vendors, food and plenty of family fun.  Insane Inflatables, a 5K inflatable obstacle course will be just one of the highlights of the family festival.  SoulFuelwv has something for everyone.  You don't want to miss this great time of Faith, Family & Fun!!
Tickets are good for the duration of the entire event. No single day tickets are available to keep costs to atendees low. Please see Ticket descriptions for more information on the different ticket types.
This is an outside/inside rain or shine event with the main events outside.  The concert area is standing with some non-reserved seating. A premium stage access area near the front of the stage will be an add on ticket for each Friday and Saturday night. Premium Access Tickets are available for purchase in addition to the general admission ticket. Both Tickets must be presented at the gate for premium access wristbands  General Admission Tickets will get you into all concerts and events associated with SoulFuelwv. 
Recommended shoes would be sneakers.  No chairs, coolers, outside food, or beverages permitted. Typical weather this time of year is sunny so please take the appropriate safety precautions for exposure to the sun.  Please see our website for more information.  All sales are final.  No ticket refunds.  Thank you so much for your interest and participation in SoulFuelwv!

name.text: YPL Summer Aperitivo ~ Complimentary Italian Cuisine
name.html: YPL Summer Aperitivo ~ Complimentary Italian Cuisine

description.text:
We are delighted to invite you to our grand Italian Cuisine Buffet event on Friday MAY 27th. Time to indulge in some fine delicacies by an internationally recognised brand at a chic Bar & restaurant in one, in a central London location.

 
Come solo / with friends... we have 3-4 Multi-Lingual hosts introducing you to one another. 
 
 
★ Doors open 7pm beat the queues arrive early for Pre-Buffet Socialising & Networking ;) 
 
 
★ 7:30pm - 9:30pm - Purchase a fixed price Cocktail on arrival (£10) and enjoy complimentary HOT & COLD BUFFET. (MINIMUM double servings).
 
ENTREE / COLD FOOD
Bruschetta (Tomato & Basil &/or & Cheese), Mini Buns, Twist Finger etc.
 
MAIN / HOT FOOD
Fresh HOT Pasta (Tortellini & Pene), Fried Panzerotti, Fried Pasta Balls,  Pizza & plenty of other high quality food.

★ Post 9:30pm - Dessert, yum!!! What's an Aperitivo without some Dessert to top up the experience, purchase any discounted drink post 9:30pm & enjoy Dessert to accompany your drink. 

 
★ Music to set the mood & an international network of young professionals looking to socialise & have fun.  


★ Party goes on till 12am, simply register online & quote YPL at the door. 
It's time chill out with friends & meet new ones everyone is welcome just bring your weekend mood, a big appetite & get ready to enjoy some divine Cocktails & specialty international food  :) 
 
QUOTE "YPL" on arrival


IMPORTANT NOTES: 
1. MAX. 2 tickets p/person p/email. 
2. Please only book BUFFET if you are 100% SURE you will attend 
3. If your circumstances change please notify youngprofessionalsinlondon@hotmail.co.uk  cancel your ticket/s at least 24hrs BEFORE the event
4. Entry is with purchase of 1 Fixed Price Cocktail / Drink of Choice (£10) includes:

Up to 2 servings of Entrees & Mains Buffet between 7:30pm till 9:30pm 
Discounted Drinks after 1st
(optional) Dessert with discounted drink purchase post-9:30pm.


EXCLUSIVE TO YPL guestlist, £1 discount off pre-paid YPL event bookings (must email in advance for discount)

description.text:
Featuring:
Blake Shelton, Tim McGraw, Dierks Bentley, Jake Owen, Sam Hunt, Chase Rice, Dean Brody, Tim Hicks,  Diamond Rio, Emerson Drive, Chase Bryant, Dylan Scott, Jason Blaine, Cam, Alan Doyle and the Beautiful Gypsies, Tebey, Aaron Pritchett, Raquel Cole, River Town Saints, Autumn Hill, Madeline Merlo, Lindsay Ell, Meghan Patrick, JoJo Mason, Jason Benoit, Jordan McIntosh, David James, Lindsay Broughton, The Reklaws, The Dungarees, Cory Marquardt, Kaitlin Kozell, Johnson Crook, Brea Lawrenson, MacArthur Clark and James Barker Band. 
 
TICKET INFORMATION


After a purchase you will receive a confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of Boots and Hearts.


If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, check your Junk/Spam folder. If you still do not see your order confirmation, click here to access the Eventbrite help center. 



If you are having any other technical issues with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite. 



For Festival Info, click here.


No electronic tickets will be issued for Boots and Hearts.  All admission ticket purchasers will receive their festival wristband(s) and camping credentials by mail. 

NOTE: Orders that cannot be shipped or orders placed after the shipping cut-off date (July 14) will be available at the toll booths (see Directions, according to the type of ticket you have).

All sales are final.


No refunds or exchanges.


Program is subject to change without notice.


Performers and lineup are subject to change without notice.


Prices are subject to change without notice.


DO NOT tamper, stretch, cut or alter your wristband in any way. Altered wristbands will be invalid and the bearer will be subject to ejection.


Full event bracelets cannot be shared (i.e. different people using them on different days).


Boots and Hearts is rain or shine!


 
CAMPING AND PARKING INFO


For camping rules, please click here.


 
STILL HAVE QUESTIONS?


Please visit our FAQ page.

description.text:
TICKET INFORMATION
 

Once you purchase, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of the Wayhome Music and Arts Festival. 
IMPORTANT: If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. If you still do not see your order confirmation, click here to access the Eventbrite help center. 
No electronic tickets will be issued for Wayhome.  All admission ticket purchasers will receive their festival wristband by mail/will call. All Full Event Wristbands purchased June 30th and earlier will be shipped to the address on the order. Those purchased after that date will be shipped directly to the venue and can be picked up at any one of the toll booth box offices upon arrival.  Please make sure to bring ID to claim your wristband(s).
If you are having any other technical ticketing-related issues with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite. For general festival info, click here.
DO NOT tamper, stretch, cut or alter your wristband in any way
Altered wristbands will be invalid and the bearer will be subject to ejection.
Wristbands cannot be shared (i.e. different people use them on different days)
All sales final
No refunds or exchanges
Program is subject to change without notice
Prices are subject to change without notice
Wayhome is rain or shine


 

STILL HAVE QUESTIONS?


Please visit our FAQ page

 
WayHome Music & Arts 2016, featuring; 
LCD SOUNDSYSTEM • ARCADE FIRE • THE KILLERS • MAJOR LAZER • M83 • HAIM • METRIC • CHVRCHES • RAY LAMONTAGNE • FKA TWIGS • CHET FAKER • ARKELLS • BEIRUT • GARY CLARK JR. • MAC DEMARCO • RAE SREMMURD • WOLF PARADE • STARS • THE LAST SHADOW PUPPETS • FOALS • THE ARCS • NATHANIEL RATELIFF & THE NIGHT SWEATS • MATT AND KIM • KURT VILE & THE VIOLATORS • GLASS ANIMALS • THIRD EYE BLIND • X AMBASSADORS • BAHAMAS • BØRNS • TORY LANEZ • KEYS N KRATES • A TRIBE CALLED RED • HALF MOON RUN • MØ • PHOSPHORESCENT • BADBADNOTGOOD • LUCIUS • PATRICK WATSON • VINCE STAPLES • ALUNAGEORGE • UNKNOWN MORTAL ORCHESTRA • SAVAGES • THE STRUTS • GOLDLINK • FEMI KUTI & THE POSITIVE FORCE • LINDSEY STIRLING • OH WONDER • ROBERT DELONG • COLEMAN HELL • WHITE DENIM • SHAD • FIDLAR • TOURIST • NOAH GUNDERSEN • BLACK MOUNTAIN • MARIAN HILL • BOMBINO • BANNERS • DILLY DALLY • YOUNG EMPIRES • ALL THEM WITCHES • MOTHERS • LANY • WHITE LUNG • BISHOP BRIGGS • THE PAPER KITES • LITTLE SCREAM • ALLIE X • BRAIDS • RIVER TIBER • TENNYSON • BOOM FOREST

name.text: Senior Open Championship Presented By Rolex
name.html: Senior Open Championship Presented By Rolex

description.text:
The Senior Open Championship Presented by Rolex will return to Carnoustie Golf Links for the first time since 2010 when the famous Scottish course plays host to the Senior Major from July 21-24, 2016.
It will be the first time the Championship is held in Scotland since Turnberry in 2012, when Fred Couples claimed a two shot victory. Carnoustie's hosting will also mark the 30th edition of The Senior Open Championship. 
Carnoustie has hosted The Open Championship on seven occasions, most recently in 2007 when Ireland’s Padraig Harrington claimed his first Claret Jug after defeating Spain’s Sergio Garcia in a play-off. 
 
FAQs
 
Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event?
Under 16 are admitted free of charge when accompanied by an adult
 
What are my transport/parking options getting to the event?
By Car:
For those using Sat Nav the postcode for Carnoustie Golf Links is DD7 7JE. There will be a FREE public park and ride service available. A separate Park and Ride map will be made available in due course. AA Road Signage and event specific signage will be visible as you approach the venue.
By Plane:
The nearest airport is Edinburgh, which is approximately 70 kilometres away
By Train:
Carnoustie Train Station is located in the centre of Carnoustie with a short walk to the Golf Course. Please follow event signage to the course.
By Bicycle
There will be bicycle facilities on site, but locks will not be provided and bikes will be left at their owner’s risk.
Disabled Parking/Transportation 
There will be designated parking for Blue Badge Holders on site. More details to follow.
Should assistance be required on site please contact the nearest volunteer.
Event Mobility
Event Mobility provides electric scooters and manual wheelchairs at events nationwide for use by the disabled, elderly and mobility impaired. The Event Mobility Trailer & Tent will be located at the entrance gate. The electric scooters and manual wheelchairs are free to hire, however, a donation to the Event Mobility Charity is expected to be made. 
Contact Number::+44 (0) 1386 725391
Website:http://www.eventmobility.org.uk

What can/can't I bring to the event?
Prohibited Items:Detailed on the back of the ticket  
No picnics / picnic hampers allowed  
The use of mobile phones is permitted but restricted to dedicated areas only, where event signage will refer to them as “mobile phone zones”. Only in these dedicated areas can calls be made or received, howeverphones must remain on silent at all times.The use of any cameras, computers and other electronic equipment at the Tournament Thursday to Sunday is not permitted other than with the proper accreditation.Cameras are allowed during the Pro Ams on Wednesday.
Making or distributing broadcasts, commentary, news reports, data, results or statistics by any meansin any format or media including any such by mobile phone or other wireless device is not permitted.Ticket holders consent to being photographed, filmed and recorded at the Tournament (including byCCTV), and consent to use of any such film, image or recording at the discretion of the promoter and/or European Tour and their licensees and partners without compensation or notice.
No dogs (other than guide dogs) or other animals are permitted on the course.All promotional, commercial, political, religious or offensive items of whatever nature including, butnot limited to, clothing, banners, signs, symbols and leaflets are prohibited.The ticket holder must comply with all relevant statutes, signs, safety announcements, directions ofstewards and ground regulations whilst attending the Tournament. Breach of any of these conditionsor any unacceptable behaviour likely to cause damage, nuisance or injury shall enable the venue orevent management to revoke this ticket and to eject the holder without compensation.


Where can I contact the organiser with any questions?
Please contact European tour ticket office
By telephone:UK 01344 840550 , Ireland 1890 252 698  Outside UK +44 1344 840550
By email:  tickets@europeantour.com
By post: European Tour Ticket Office, Mirren Court Three, 123 Renfrew Road, Paisley , PA3 4EA 


Is my registration/ticket transferrable?
Tickets are non transferable. Any transfer of this ticket will render it void.The ticket remains the property of the Tournament at all times.


Can I update my registration information?
You can update registration prior to arrivable at venue 


Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event?
Printed tickets must be brought to the venue. Lost, stolen or damaged tickets cannot be replaced


What is the refund policy?
Tickets are non refundable including in the event of curtailment or cancellation through adverse weather.

description.text:
WOMAD – The World’s Festival.
Come along to the world’s festival for a feast for all the senses! Hear the best music you’ve never heard before, join in with workshops led by musicians from around the world, taste delicious and exotic food cooked by the artists, listen to talks, experience the art, relax in the arboretum, and generally soak up the atmosphere of the joy of discovery.   Kids go FREE! Bring your kids along for free and let them run free. WOMAD is their playground.   All teenagers must be registered prior to arriving on site. One ticket holding parent or guardian over the age of 22 can only accompany up to four people under the age of 18. 
The price displayed is the total price per ticket and includes booking fee.
The weekend ticket price includes;

Entry to the festival with a melting pot of talented artists from around the world, with around 200 performances across 4 days, from more than 100 artists, across 7 stages
Three nights camping
Free parking
Free wifi
Free app
Free access to the World of Children which includes free workshops
Free workshops with artists from around the world
Free Taste the World workshops where you get to experience food from around the world made by the artists
Poetry, talks and lively debate from an array of fascinating people
Booking fee

Tickets are non-refundable.
For more information go to www.womad.co.uk

description.text:
For more information please visit:www.gilroygarlicfestival.com
DATES & TIMES:July 29, 30 & 31, 2016Festival open from 10:00am to 7:00pm (gates close at 6:00pm)
DIRECTIONS:Watch for the electronic signs on Hwy 101 or 152 as you enter Gilroy. Follow the signs and watch for traffic control officers on roadways. As you approach Gilroy DO NOT use your GPS to navigate to the Festival grounds as nearby streets are blocked off. All traffic is directed to festival parking lots.
TICKETS:
Online tickets available June 1st, 2016 until July 31, 2016 at 4:00PM.
Regular ticket prices at the gate:• Adults (ages 13-59) - $20.00• Child/Senior (ages 6-12 and 60+) - $15.00• Children under 6 admitted free with an adult• Gourmet Alley Combo Plate - $15.00 (Save $2 when purchased online in advance)• Parking - $10.00
Gourmet Alley Combo Plate 1: ½ Peppersteak Sandwich, Calamari, Pasta con Pesto, Garlic Bread.Gourmet Alley Combo Plate 2: ½ Sausage Sandwich, Scampi, Mushrooms, Garlic Bread.Combo Plate choice is made at the Festival.
The admission price includes musical entertainment, cooking demonstrations, and a children's area. Food and beverages may be purchased from Gourmet Alley or the vendors. Prices range from $2 to $15 or more depending on the item, which is typically a full-size serving, not a sample.
Ride the Garlic Train to the Festival!That's right, this year you can ride Caltrain to the Garlic Festival on Saturday July 30th or Sunday July 31st. This is the easiest and most relaxing way to get to the Festival from the Peninsula. A chartered special event train will depart San Jose Diridon Station at 10:00AM, arriving non-stop in downtown Gilroy an hour later where a bus will shuttle you to the Festival. At 4:00PM you can board a bus to return from the Festival to the Gilroy Caltrain station where the train will depart at 5:00PM, returning you non-stop to the Diridon Station in San Jose one hour later. This special round-trip ticket is only available online in advance and includes Festival admission. This ticket is not available for purchase from Caltrain or at the train station.
The Garlic Train is scheduled so that riders wishing to take normal weekend Caltrain service from as far north as San Francisco can connect with the Garlic Train in San Jose. Riders wishing to take advantage of that connecting service will need to purchase tickets directly from Caltrain for peninsula service, and switch trains at the Diridon Station in San Jose.
There are no refunds or exchanges for Gilroy Garlic Festival tickets purchased online. All sales are final.
The Festival is held in a park. It is all outdoors with mostly turf and some compact dirt and asphalt walkways. There are natural shade trees, and many shade tents with tables and benches.
Shirt and shoes are required.
Christmas Hill Park rules prohibit bringing the following items on Festival grounds:

Alcohol of any kind
Bottles, glass and cans
Coolers – large or small
Frisbees and water projecting devices
Pocket knives and weapons of any kind.

Please be advised that the City of Gilroy park rules prohibit dogs and other animals from being brought into the park, except Service Dogs.
The Gilroy Garlic Festival is a celebration of food, fun and family. It is the Garlic Festival's policy to provide a safe, family-friendly atmosphere for all Festival patrons and volunteers. Therefore, the Garlic Festival refuses entry or admission to anyone wearing clothing or paraphernalia indicating or signifying membership in a gang, including a motorcycle club. This policy is applied equally to all persons, regardless of their sex, race, color, religion, ancestry, national origin, disability or medical condition.
Ticketing FAQs:I ordered my ticket online, how will I RECEIVE my ticket?Tickets ordered online are e-tickets. Check your email inbox for your Order Confirmation from Eventbrite. Your e-tickets will be attached to your order confirmation email. Make sure to print them out and bring them to the event. IMPORTANT: if you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder.Do I need to PRINT out my tickets?Please print and bring your ticket(s), sent to you as an e-mail attachment, to the event entrance, or be prepared to display your barcoded e-ticket on your smartphone or tablet.I still don't see my order confirmation, what should I do?I am having trouble printing my PDF ticket, what should I do?Please click here for more information on finding your order confirmation or printing your ticket(s). For non-technical ticketing questions or other information about the event click here or call: (408) 842-1625 M-F, 9:00am-5:00pm.I bought two tickets and they both have my name on them. Will this be a problem?No. Online general admission tickets are transferable. The name on your ticket only signifies who purchased the tickets. Just make sure the bar code on your ticket(s) are not damaged when you print them out.  If you would like to update the name or email address on your order, click here.

    Ticketing FAQs:

    I ordered my ticket online, how will I RECEIVE my ticket?
    Tickets ordered online are e-tickets. Check your email inbox for your Order Confirmation from Eventbrite. Your e-tickets will be attached to your order confirmation email. Make sure to print them out and bring them to the event. IMPORTANT: if you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder.

    Do I need to PRINT out my tickets?
    Please print and bring your ticket(s), sent to you as an e-mail attachment, to the event entrance, or be prepared to display your barcoded e-ticket on your smartphone or tablet.

    I still don't see my order confirmation, what should I do?
    I am having trouble printing my PDF ticket, what should I do?
    Please click here for more information on finding your order confirmation or printing your ticket(s).     For non-technical ticketing questions or other information about the event click here or call: (408) 842-1625 M-F, 9:00am-5:00pm.

    I bought two tickets and they both have my name on them. Will this be a problem?
    No. Online general admission tickets are transferable. The name on your ticket only signifies who purchased the tickets. Just make sure the bar code on your ticket(s) are not damaged when you print them out.  If you would like to update the name or email address on your order, click here.

description.text:
The Festival at Sandpoint celebrates its 34th annual summer concert series, August 4-14, showcasing eight nights of music under the stars, on the shores of Lake Pend Oreille, in Sandpoint, Idaho.  The season line-up serves up an eclectic mix of classic favorites and progressive artists with headliners:

Thursday, August 4, celebrate Opening Night at The Festival at Sandpoint with Grammy Award winning singer and keyboardist BRUCE HORNSBY with his touring band The Noisemakers. Sandpoint’s own BRIDGES HOME, featuring Dave & Tami Gunter, with Paul Gunter, will open the All tickets are $44.95. The Festival’s popular Brew Tasting tickets are available for $10 -- which includes a commemorative pilsner glass and premium microbrew tastes.  The Brew Fest starts when gates open at 6:00 PM.  Concert starts at 7:30 PM.  

Friday, August 5, Railroad Earth is a roots and Americana-based newgrass jam band from Stillwater, New Jersey. Rabbit Wilde, a high energy bluegrass band out of Bellingham, WA, will get the crowd warmed up.  Doors open at 6:00 PM, concert starts at 7:30 PM. PLEASE NOTE: This is a DANCE SHOW! 

On August 6, Country Music Hall of Fame singer songwriter EMMYLOU HARRIS headlines a Super Saturday show with special guests THE BROS. LANDRETH and local favorites The Powers.  All tickets are $54.95.  Gates will open at 4:30 PM and the music starts at 6:00 PM. 
Sunday, August  7th is musical fun for the young and young at heart!  The Festival presents its FAMILY CONCERT, “Peter and the Wolf” featuring the Festival Community Orchestra and Sandpoint’s Studio One Dancers. Favorite pre-concert activities include the Instrument Petting Zoo (where kids can try out various instruments with guidance from high school musical mentors), an animal petting zoo, pony rides, clowns, face painting, games galore and the popular Parents’ Corner where moms and dads can take a break from the chaos for a complimentary mini-massage.  All tickets are only $6.00. Activities begin when the gates open at 2:30 PM and the musical performance starts at 5:00 PM.

Thursday, August 11th,  the undisputed queen of African music ANGELIQUE KIDJO, a Beninese-born American Grammy Award winning singer-songwriter and activist, noted for her diverse musical influences and creative music videos. Opening is AFROSONICS is an Afro Indie band based in Boise, Idaho, specializing in upbeat, positive, multicultural music that makes people want to groove. All tickets are $39.95.  Gates open at 6:00 PM, concert starts at 7:30 PM. 

Friday, August 12 NITTY GRITTY DIRT BAND comes to Sandpoint as part their historic 50th Anniversary Tour. We can’t wait to welcome them back to Sandpoint!Rolling Stone says LUKE BELL “plays classic honky-tonk with a wink and a yodel that summons the sleeping ghosts of country better than any voodoo spell ever could. All tickets are $44.95. Gates will open at 6:00pm and the music starts at 7:30pm.

August 13th, Super Star BEN HARPER & THE INNOCENT CRIMINALS headline our second Super Saturday show. A singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist, Harper plays an eclectic mix of blues, folk, soul, reggae and rock music. All tickets are $64.95. Gates will open at 4:30 PM and the music starts at 6:00 PM.

The Festival season culminates on Sunday, August 14 with the GRAND FINALE CONCERT:  A MIDSUMMER NIGHT’S DREAM featuring the SPOKANE SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA, conducted by MAESTRO GARY SHELDON with the return of the sensational jazz pianist and composer Vadim Neselovskyi and two Sandpoint natives Jason Moody (violin) and Hailey Fuqua (soprano). Gates open early at 4:30 PM for the annual “Taste of the Stars” Wine Tasting, the largest wine event of its kind in the state of Idaho.  The wine tasting is complimentary for all concert goers over the age of 21 years.  Concert starts at 7:30 PM.  Tickets are $39.95 for adults, $10.95 for youth 0 - 18 years.

 ATLANTA HIP HOP DAY
SEPTEMBER 24TH - 25TH
AT ROBERT WOODRUFF PARK
91 PEACHTREE ST., ATLANTA, GA 30303
The 5th Annual Atlanta Hip Hop Day Festival is a free festival that pays tribute to the four elements of Hip Hop and Atlanta's contribution to Hip Hop as a whole. The Festival is held downtown Atlanta at Robert Woodruff Park. The four sides of the park are dedicated to the four elements of Hip Hop displaying B-Boy & B-Girl exhibits, Emcee Battles, Turntablism and Graffiti artists.Entertainment Includes:

name.text: WORLD CLUB DOME ZUSATZ FESTIVAL - I AM HARDWELL
name.html: WORLD CLUB DOME ZUSATZ FESTIVAL - I AM HARDWELL

description.text:
Das BigCityBeats WORLD CLUB DOME Zusatzfestival auf dem Hockenheimring
Das spektakuläre Finale derI AM Hardwell – United We Are World TourFestival-Feeling inklusive Camping27. August 2016
Aufgrund der großen Nachfrage nach dem BigCityBeats WORLD CLUB DOME gibt es wohl etwas Einzigartiges in der Festivallandschaft: Das BigCityBeats WORD CLUB DOME ZUSATZFESTIVAL auf dem Hockenheimring!
Es wird gleichzeitig das Finale, der gigantische Abschluss der „I AM Hardwell – United We Are“ World Tour. 
Am 27. August 2016 entsteht mit dem „I AM Hardwell – United We Are“ Abschlusskonzert beim BigCityBeats VIRTUAL WORLD CLUB DOME noch einmal Festivalstimmung. Eine gigantische Produktion, bei der viele „I AM Hardwell“-Acts mit dabei sein werden und gemeinsam mit dem Superstar DJ Hardwell seine größte Show abfeiern.
Tickets für diesen gigantischen Event gibt es ab 19,00 Euro plus Camping zu einem Preis von 12,50 Euro. Das ist unschlagbar und belastet den Geldbeutel kaum. 
Ist Deutschland bereit für ein Vorhaben, was es an Einmaligkeit so noch nicht gegeben hat?

description.text:
Roam the High Line after-hours and be transported as dancers, musicians, and visual artists illuminate the park with participatory performances, installations, and a world of hidden surprises.
Rob RothNight Paving: The Aural History of Jackie 60 & MOTHERProducers, performers, and attend­ees of the legendary Tuesday night club party Jackie 60 and nightclub MOTHER take you on a wondrous soundscape journey of storytelling and music.
Jordan EaglesBlood IlluminationsGet immersed in the astonishing and bracing world of visual artist and activist Jordan Eagles.
THE DANCE CARTEL with DJ Average Jo, LinelightParticipate in this ecstatic dance performance as it unfolds into a vibrant collective experience. DJ Average Jo will lead the beat and spin music throughout the night. Lighting Design by Joe Cantalupo. Litewall created by Joe Cantalupo and Dave Tennent
Yael "KAT" Modiano & Ursula ScherrerUrban Night Dialogue: Contemporary Electro-acoustic Flute Soundscapes with Live Video Art in Urban ScenarioSuccumb to heavenly electronic and flute melodies, while dazzling visuals completely surround you.
Merche BlascoSonic BloomExplore the Chelsea Grasslands by flashlight, as a grid of sensors trig­ger acoustic responses. The result will be a spontaneous symphony arising from communal interaction.
Carte Blanche PerformancesOx ProwlLet these mysterious dancers in giant glowing lanterns guide you through the park. Look out for moments of intimate encounters and spontaneous performances.

Due to limited capacity on the High Line, please be advised that RSVP does not guarantee entry to Up Late. Entrance is on a first-come, first-served basis.

PROGRAM PARNTER
Urban Night Dialogue: Contemporary Electro-acoustic Flute Soundscapes with Live Video Art in Urban Scenario is made possible in part with public funds from Creative Engagement, supported by the New York City Department of Cultural Affairs in partnership with the City Council and the New York State Council on the Arts with the support of Governor Andrew Cuomo and administered by Lower Manhattan Cultural Council.
Lower Manhattan Cultural CouncilNew York State Council on the ArtsNew York City Department of Cultural Affairs in partnership with the City Council

SUPPORT
Public Programs on the High Line are supported by Altman Foundation. These programs are supported, in part, with public funds from the New York City Council, under the leadership of Speaker Melissa Mark-Viverito.

description.text:
Eaux Claires is a multi-stage experience featuring live music, performance art, visual art, food and more. The festival is curated by Eau Claire native Justin Vernon of Bon Iver, in collaboration with Aaron Dessner of The National. It is held on Foster Farms in Eau Claire, WI, August 12 & 13, 2016. All ages are welcome, children ten and under are free. For more information, please consult eauxclaires.com. 
 
 
 
Performances by Alpha Consumer, Andrew Fitzpatrick, Beach House, Bon Iver, Bruce Hornsby & The Noisemakers performing "The Way It Is", Buke and Gase, Catsax, Cornelius performing "Fantasma", Day Of The Dead, Deafheaven, Efird/Westerlund, eighth blackbird with Bryce Dessner & Bonnie "Prince" Billy, Erykah Badu, EX EYE, FOG, Francis and The Lights, Har Mar Superstar, Jacy Catlin, James Blake, Jenny Lewis, Jon Hopkins, Jon Mueller, Kill The Vultures, Lisa Hannigan & Aaron Dessner, Little Scream, LNZNDRF, Lucius, Mavis Staples, Melvins, Midnite Express, My Brightest Diamond, Nathaniel Rateliff & The Night Sweats, Phil Cook's "Southland Revue", Phosphorescent, Prinze George, Richard Reed Parry/Quiet River of Dust, Rosenau/Sanborn, S. Carey, Sam Amidon, Sarah Neufeld, Senyawa, Shabazz Palaces, sloslylove, So Percussion, Taggart & Rosewood, Tenement, The Staves and yMusic, Thomas Wincek, Tickle Torture, Tuskha, Unknown Mortal Orchestra, Vince Staples, William Tyler, yMusic, and more announcements to come… 
 
 
 
Ticketing Policies
- Once you purchase, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of Eaux Claires
- IMPORTANT: If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. If you still do not see your order confirmation, click here to access the Eventbrite help center.
- Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable.
- If you are having any other technical ticketing-related issues with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite. For general festival info, click here.
 
Camping Overview
YOU ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE A CAMPSITE ACCESS PASS AND FESTIVAL PASS TO ACCESS THE CAMPGROUNDS. Each campsite comes with one camp access pass included.  All campsites are approximately 20’ x 40’. You will be allowed to park one vehicle on your site. No power or hookups are available. No fires are permissible without a campsite issued fire ring. All campsites are loaded in on a first come basis. If you wish to camp adjacent to friends/family, be sure to have all vehicles enter the campgrounds at the same time. No re-entry with your vehicle once you enter the campgrounds. Complimentary shuttle service will be provided to/from festival. You are not guaranteed access onto the campgrounds if you do not purchase a festival pass in advance. 
 
FAQs
When can I arrive at the festival?
The festival box office opens at 11am on August 12th + 13th. Gates open at 12pm. Festival parking will open 8am on August 1tth and close 12pm August 14th. Parking overnight is permitted. 
 
When is the campground open?
The campground opens Thursday, August 11th at 8 AM, and closes Sunday, August 14th at 12pm. 
 
What happens if it rains?
Eaux Claires is a rain or shine event.
 
How do I get there?
Eaux Claires is located on Foster Farms. The Main Entrance is at 3443 Crescent Avenue, Eau Claire, Wisconsin. You can arrive by car, with the purchase of festival parking, or on one of our shuttles from the campground, dorms, or hotels. Please consult the transportation page on our website for more information on shuttles and parking.
 
Do I have to camp to attend the festival?
Camping is not required to attend the festival. There are many hotels in the Eau Claire area, and the University of Wisconsin Eau Claire will be offering dorm lodging again which you can book here. We recommend booking early. 
 
When is the performance schedule released?
A few weeks prior to the festival. If you want to be notified right away once the schedule is released, be sure to sign up for our mailing list or festival app. Artist lineup subject to change without notice.
 
What does the Chippewa Enhanced Pass get me?
Access to a shaded lounge area located near the Lake Eau Lune stage, featuring complimentary meals and beer/wine offerings while in the lounge.
 
Is the Festival accessible to people with disabilities?
There will be ADA access throughout most of the main grounds, conditions may vary due to weather.  For assistance from Crescent Avenue to the grounds, please use our shuttle. That path is not recommended for anyone with disabilities or trouble walking on rough terrain. Eaux Claires staff will be on hand to assist those in need. ADA accessible restrooms will be available. We have no-fee ADA parking in our lot directly across the street from the festival entrance, and provide a shuttle service from your vehicle to the main entrance. You must have a valid state or federally issued ADA license plate or pass to utilize these spaces.
 
What happens if the event is cancelled?
In the event a single day or multiple days of the festival are cancelled, ticket holders will be notified of cancellation and refund policy. Artist lineup is subject to change including in the event of weather.

Witness the sound and power of thrilling jet demonstrations, world class aerobatic performers, warbirds, vintage aircraft, and interactive displays that will dazzle and amaze you at the 2016 Wings Over Wine Country Airshow.
2016 features demos by the US Air Force F-22 Raptor Stealth Fighter, Royal Canadian Air Force CF-18 Hornet and US Navy F-18 Super Hornet. 
Gates open at 9:00 AM Saturday and Sunday, Sept 24 & 25. Come ready for a thrill filled day in the Wine Country sun!

description.text:
Whether you are a graduate, unemployed, new to Canada, a seasoned veteran looking to change careers, or even a student new to the workforce, Canada Job Expo is a great place to begin your career path. Canada Job Expo provides plenty of information, job resources and discussions and opportunities for employment.
This expo is one of the most attended and free job fairs in the Greater Toronto Area with an environment of networking, learning and a day of professional interactions.
 
Our past events have included major Canadian employers like  Apple Canada, Bell Canada, Canada Post, Desjardins, Moosehead Breweries, Toronto Police, Ontario Public Service (Ministry of Govt. Services) and a host of employers from Alberta, Manitoba, British Columbia as well as International Organizations.
Please also join our mailing list on our home page to receive event updates.
 
This expo brings Canadian employers, various organizations and educational institutions together with skilled workers and students for a day of networking, learning and employment advice. There are five free workshops available to everyone who attend this one day event. For further information, visit the website www.canadajobexpo.com
 
This event is FREE to job seekers and those in between careers. Everyone is welcome to attend and gain something out of it. There are no restrictions on who can attend.
 
For organizations looking to register a booth with us, please contact us for further details, cost, registration process etc.
.

AFROPUNK FEST BROOKLYN 2016 Commodore ParkSaturday, August 27th & Sunday, August 28th
TICKET INFORMATION •    Once you purchase your ticket, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of The AFROPUNK Festival. Your confirmation will be attached to your email. Make sure to print them out and bring them to the event. Or, you could go green and download the Eventbrite app on your smart phone! •    IMPORTANT: If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. •    If you are having any other technical issue with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite.  •    All purchases are final. No refunds or exchanges. •    Event is rain or shine. •    Artists subject to change. **Only purchase from official AFROPUNK page. If you purchase from another source, you risk purchasing a counterfeit or invalid pass. AFROPUNK is not responsible for passes purchased from unofficial sources.
**Duplicate RSVP's will not be honored. All duplicate sign-ups will be cancelled.
How does the payment plan work? Affirm offers clear, simple financing to split your Eventbrite order into 3 or 6 monthly payments (rates from 10-30% APR). Once you select Monthly Payments with Affirm on the Eventbrite checkout page, you will need to confirm your loan on Affirm. Your tickets will be emailed to you immediately upon checkout. Make sure you pay your Affirm bills on or before your due dates.

description.text:
-- ABOUT IMAGINE FESTIVAL --
Imagine Music Festival (IMF) is an electronic dance music festival held in Atlanta, Georgia. Voted Top 30 festival in the world by Fest300, and Top Ten Emerging Music Festivals by USA Today, the festival features multiple stages hosting the world’s top electronic musicians, DJ's and bands along with captivating cirque style acts & performances.
When Imagine Music Festival arrives, the event will transport festival-goers to an immersive aquatic fairytale featuring multiple magnificent stages with world-class sound and lighting production.  Wander through fantastic atmospheres filled with mind-bending circus performers, mermaids, sea creatures, art installations, vendors and more, creating an unforgettable 360-degree experience.
IMF guests may choose from several different ticket options to accommodate all interests. Those seeking a more exclusive Imagine Festival experience may choose from our VIP packages, providing multiple levels of comfort and amenities.
The combination of your favorite artists, interactive entertainment, captivating art installations and so much more, will make your Imagine Festival experience one you will never forget.
We look forward to bringing your imagination to life! Welcome to the Imagine Music Festival.
FESTIVAL TICKETS DO NOT INCLUDE CAMPING - YOU NEED TO PURCHASE CAMPING PASSES SEPERATELY HERE TO CAMP AT IMAGINE. To enter the campgrounds, you must have BOTH a Camping Pass AND Festival Ticket. 
 
PLEASE BE ADVISED: In order to protect yourself against purchasing potentially fraudulent tickets, please only purchase tickets from an official source. If you buy tickets from an unauthorized third party, there is a chance that they are not legitimate tickets and will not be honored for entry to the festival. At the present time, this online ordering system is the only official source of tickets.
 

NO REFUNDS OR EXCHANGES, ALL SALES FINAL
TICKETS ARE NON-TRANSFERRABLE
TICKET MUST MATCH NAME ON YOUR ID
Fees include $8 Venue Fee.
Tickets can be purchased at the box office but only on the days of the event and only if tickets are still available
Box Office opens at 11am each day 
RAIN OR SHINE, subject to safety requirements
PRICES SUBJECT TO CHANGE AT ANY TIME
Passes cannot be used for promotional purposes (e.g. unauthorized contests or promotional giveaways)All event information and ticket prices are subject to change
All patrons subject to search
Subject to all other wristband terms of use

description.text:
Whether you are a graduate, unemployed, new to Canada, a seasoned veteran looking to change careers, or even a student new to the workforce, Canada Job Expo is a great place to begin your career path. Canada Job Expo provides plenty of information, job resources and discussions and opportunities for employment.
This expo is one of the most attended and free job fairs in the Greater Toronto Area with an environment of networking, learning and a day of professional interactions.
 
Our past events have included major Canadian employers like Apple Canada, Rogers Communications, Bell Canada, Canada Post, ADT Canada, Desjardins, Moosehead Breweries, Toronto Police, Ontario Public Service (Ministry of Govt. Services) and a host of employers from Alberta, Manitoba, British Columbia as well as International Organizations from China and South Korea.
 
This expo brings Canadian employers, various organizations and educational institutions together with skilled workers and students for a day of networking, learning and employment advice. There are five free workshops available to everyone who attend this one day event. For further information, visit the website www.canadajobexpo.com
 
This event is FREE to job seekers and those in between careers. Everyone is welcome to attend and gain something out of it. There are no restrictions on who can attend.
 
For organizations looking to register a booth with us, please contact us for further details, cost, registration process etc.

name.text: MI Brewers Guild 19th Annual Summer Beer Festival - July 22 & 23, 2016
name.html: MI Brewers Guild 19th Annual Summer Beer Festival - July 22 & 23, 2016

description.text:
Tickets on sale Thursday, April 28 @ 10am (with Enthusiast Member Pre-Sale on Tues. Apr. 26 & Wed. Apr. 27)
The 19th Annual Michigan Brewers Guild's Summer Beer Festival is the largest Michigan-only beer festival in the state. With over 100 Michigan breweries participating, guests have around 1,000 different craft beers to choose from. 15 sampling tokens are included in the price of a ticket, and additional tokens are for sale at the event for just 50 cents. Food will be also available for purchase inside the festival, and guests will enjoy live music from a variety of Michigan bands.
More information at mibeer.com/summer-festival.

description.text: Outlook Festival 2016 Thursday, 1st September - Sunday, 4th September 2015 (music finishes at 6am Monday 5th) Eclectic without losing sight of its identity, Outlook Festival boasts live acts and DJ sets that span ages, generations, styles and decades. Set in an abandoned Roman fort, a dungeon, a moat and a harbor to keep festival goers in a state of awe over the course of four days - Outlook Festival is an experience like no other and one not to be missed!

JETZT FAN WERDEN: https://www.facebook.com/HamburgHoliFestivalOfColours✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫LINE-UP 2016:
▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼
TOPICHONKAHELL YES EHEMALS DUMME JUNGSSCHLUCK DEN DRUCKIZZY TRIXXDJ DENSPINJUHOST: SOLA PLEXUS
LOCATION:
Volkspark-Stadion Hamburg
Seit wir 2012 das erste Holi Festival of Colours weltweit mit unserem Konzept veranstalten - sind wir nun mittlerweile in über 20 Ländern aktiv und haben lange überlegt, was wir euch 2016 neues bieten wollen.Lange haben wir mit großen Firmen zusammen getüftelt: und werden euch nächstes Jahr eine in Deutschland einmalige, noch nie dagewesene BOMBASTISCHE BÜHNE mit entsprechend eindrucksvoller SHOW bieten! Jeder kennt sie von Fotos und Videos: die unglaublichen Stages vom Tomorrowland & Co. Wir werden euch mit einer unglaublichen Kulisse von den Socken hauen!Seid also DABEI wenn es wieder heißt: 3...2...1..: FARBE!!
-----2012 ging durch UNS das große Farben-Werfen los. Wir brachten das Holi Festival Of Colours nach Deutschland! Wollt ihr wissen, wie alles begann? Hier gibt es Impressionen der letzten Holi Festival Of Colours aus dem letzten Jahr, die Lust auf die nächsten Festivals machen:www.HOLIFESTIVAL.com
Der Rückblick 2015:
Den ganzen Sommer und Winter über tourten wir durch fast alle europäischen Länder, sowie VAE, Peru, Lebanon, Chile, Panama, Südafrika, Argentinien, Mexiko, El-Salvador, Australien usw. und haben uns von Show zu Show gesteigert - so dass wir jetzt, nach knapp 1.200.000 Besuchern - euch 2016 eine wahrhaft UNVERGESSLICHE, EINDRUCKSVOLLE SHOW mit neuer Story, riesiger Stage, bombastischer Tageseffekt-Show bieten werden. Seid gespannt und freut euch auf ein einmaliges Erlebnis!
 
FAQs
Muss ich mich am Einlass ausweisen oder gibt es eine Altersbeschränkung für das Event?
Das Festival is ab 16 Jahren. Auch in Begleitung eines Erwachsenen haben unter 16-Jährige keinen Zutritt. Bitte einen Ausweiß mitbringen, da am Einlass kontrolliert wird. 
Was kann ich zum Event mitbringen und was nicht?
Eigene Speisen und Getränke dürfen leider nicht mit auf das Konzertgelände genommen werden. Erlaubt sind Handykameras, einfache Digitalkameras und GoPros. Spiegelreflexkameras und DSLRs sind nur mit Genehmigung zugelassen. Diese kann bei foto@holifestival.com angefordert werden. Da uns die Umwelt und eure Gesundheit am Herzen liegt, lassen wir nur getestetes und geprüftes Pulver zu, das ihr auf dem Gelände kaufen könnt. Um das gewährleisten zu können, ist das Mitbringen von Pulver nicht erlaubt. 
Ist meine Registrierung/mein Ticket übertragbar?
Ja, die Tickets sind übertragbar.
Muss ich das ausgedruckte Ticket mitbringen?
Ja, das Ticket muss in ausgedruckter Form mitgebracht werden. 
Wie sehen die Rückerstattungsbedingungen aus?
Ein Rückerstattung ist leider nicht möglich, allerdings können Tickets im privaten Rahmen weitergegeben werden. 
Der Name auf der Registrierung/dem Ticket stimmt nicht mit dem Namen des Teilnehmers überein. Ist das ein Problem?
Nein, das ist kein Problem. Man kommt auch mit einem Ticket rein, auf dem ein anderer Name steht.

name.text: Wildlife Safari Spring/Summer Drive Thru Admission Tickets: March to September
name.html: Wildlife Safari Spring/Summer Drive Thru Admission Tickets: March to September

description.text:
The Event: Drive-thru Admission Ticket --     (March 1, 2016 thru September 30, 2016)
Explore Wildlife Safari's 600-acre park, "Safari style", as you drive through the more than four miles of winding grounds to catch breathtaking, up-close views: Bison, zebras, and giraffes roam the wide-open surroundings, living in harmony with tigers, lions, bears, elephants & more! You and your family will be wide-eyed over the 550 wild animals from Africa, Asia, and the Americas.
Redemption date can be one of any of the dates included in the time-fram indicated on the ticket.
Each Drive-thru admission ticket is good for one person but includes TWO trips through the drive-thru on the date they are redeemed.
Park Hours:
November to February: 10am - 4pm                                                                                                        *Last car admitted to Drive-Thru at 4pm            
March to October: 9am - 5pm                                                                                                                  *Last car admitted to Drive-Thru at 5pm 
WE ARE OPEN 363 DAYS A YEAR! We are only closed for Thanksgiving and Christmas.
TICKETS ARE NON-REFUNDABLE. Please remember to use your ticket any date in March thru Otober 2016
Park Restrictions & Important Information:
All vehicles allowed EXCEPT the following:No Open Top Vehicles (Convertibles must have tops up at all times)No Motorcycles**NO pets in the village or drive thru**Kennels available at no charge outside the Safari VillageBring your own lock or buy one on site.Other Features in the park:In between your drive-thru trips, you can explore our free Safari Village with over 200 animals on diplay. Visit our petting zoo, have lunch in the White Rhino Cafe', catch a camel or train ride, and shop in our Gift Shop. With extra fun features like a photo booth, wind-tunnel and our NEW Badger Rock & Gem Mining Exhibit, there is always something fun for everyone here at the Safari.
Want more adventure? We offer oodles of group and private Safari Animal Encounters and Special Events. Feed a giraffe or bear, pet or even wash an elephant, get uber close to endangered cats like cheetahs and Sumatran Tigers. You can even camp out with the lions!

March to October: 9am - 5pm                                                                                                                  *Last car admitted to Drive-Thru at 5pm 

WE ARE OPEN 363 DAYS A YEAR! We are only closed for Thanksgiving and Christmas.

TICKETS ARE NON-REFUNDABLE. Please remember to use your ticket any date in March thru Otober 2016

Park Restrictions & Important Information:

All vehicles allowed EXCEPT the following:
No Open Top Vehicles (Convertibles must have tops up at all times)
No Motorcycles

**NO pets in the village or drive thru**
Kennels available at no charge outside the Safari Village
Bring your own lock or buy one on site.

Other Features in the park:
In between your drive-thru trips, you can explore our free Safari Village with over 200 animals on diplay. Visit our petting zoo, have lunch in the White Rhino Cafe', catch a camel or train ride, and shop in our Gift Shop. With extra fun features like a photo booth, wind-tunnel and our NEW Badger Rock & Gem Mining Exhibit, there is always something fun for everyone here at the Safari.

Want more adventure? We offer oodles of group and private Safari Animal Encounters and Special Events. Feed a giraffe or bear, pet or even wash an elephant, get uber close to endangered cats like cheetahs and Sumatran Tigers. You can even camp out with the lions!

name.text: Dinosaurs: Unextinct at the L.A. Zoo! June – October, 2016
name.html: Dinosaurs: Unextinct at the L.A. Zoo! June – October, 2016

description.text:
17 Life-Size, Life-Like Dinosaurs at the L.A. Zoo
See them before they extinct again!
Purchase tickets today and use them ANY TIME between now and October 31, 2016. Entry to this exhibit requires a Dinosaurs: Unextinct at the L.A. Zoo ticket plus Zoo admission or GLAZA membership. See below for details.
About: Explore a previously off-limits part of the Zoo, now home to moving, roaring, snarling, claw-bearing dinosaurs “brought back to life” for a limited time. Along the way, unlock special content and 3D animations through a custom app (available for iPhone and Android devices soon), indulge your inner paleontologist by joining a fossil dig, and learn how the mighty creatures of the Mesozoic era compare with animals of today.
Time: Open daily at 10 a.m. Last entry at 4 p.m.
Valid Dates: Your ticket is valid for one-time entry to the exhibit, Monday through Sunday, from the date of purchase through the exhibit’s closing day of October 31, 2016 (subject to capacity). Tickets are not valid after closing day. No refunds will be issued for unused tickets.
Refund and Exchange Policy: The exhibit is open rain or shine. No rain checks will be issued. No reentry.
Zoo Admission: Dinosaurs: Unextinct at the L.A. Zoo is a separately ticketed exhibit inside the Zoo. General admission tickets to the Los Angeles Zoo or GLAZA membership are still required. Tickets to the Zoo can be purchased online at the L.A. Zoo website.
By registering for this event, you agree to receive information and email communications from the Greater Los Angeles Zoo Association for this ticket purchase as well as future L.A. Zoo news and events.
For more information, go to www.lazoo.org/dinos
***

description.text:
JETZT FAN WERDEN: https://www.facebook.com/HoliFestivalOfColoursLeverkusen✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫LINE-UP 2016:
▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼
TOPICHONKAHELL YES EHEMALS DUMME JUNGSIZZY TRIXXDJ DENSOLIVER MAGENTA PINJUHOST: SOLA PLEXUS
LOCATION:
Neulandpark Leverkusen
Seit wir 2012 das erste Holi Festival of Colours weltweit mit unserem Konzept veranstalten - sind wir nun mittlerweile in über 20 Ländern aktiv und haben lange überlegt, was wir euch 2016 neues bieten wollen.Lange haben wir mit großen Firmen zusammen getüftelt: und werden euch nächstes Jahr eine in Deutschland einmalige, noch nie dagewesene BOMBASTISCHE BÜHNE mit entsprechend eindrucksvoller SHOW bieten! Jeder kennt sie von Fotos und Videos: die unglaublichen Stages vom Tomorrowland & Co. Wir werden euch mit einer unglaublichen Kulisse von den Socken hauen!Seid also DABEI wenn es wieder heißt: 3...2...1..: FARBE!!
-----2012 ging durch UNS das große Farben-Werfen los. Wir brachten das Holi Festival Of Colours nach Deutschland! Wollt ihr wissen, wie alles begann? Hier gibt es Impressionen der letzten Holi Festival Of Colours aus dem letzten Jahr, die Lust auf die nächsten Festivals machen:www.HOLIFESTIVAL.com
Der Rückblick 2015:
Den ganzen Sommer und Winter über tourten wir durch fast alle europäischen Länder, sowie VAE, Peru, Lebanon, Chile, Panama, Südafrika, Argentinien, Mexiko, El-Salvador, Australien usw. und haben uns von Show zu Show gesteigert - so dass wir jetzt, nach knapp 1.200.000 Besuchern - euch 2016 eine wahrhaft UNVERGESSLICHE, EINDRUCKSVOLLE SHOW mit neuer Story, riesiger Stage, bombastischer Tageseffekt-Show bieten werden. Seid gespannt und freut euch auf ein einmaliges Erlebnis!
 
FAQs
Muss ich mich am Einlass ausweisen oder gibt es eine Altersbeschränkung für das Event?
Das Festival is ab 16 Jahren. Auch in Begleitung eines Erwachsenen haben unter 16-Jährige keinen Zutritt. Bitte einen Ausweiß mitbringen, da am Einlass kontrolliert wird. 
Was kann ich zum Event mitbringen und was nicht?
Eigene Speisen und Getränke dürfen leider nicht mit auf das Konzertgelände genommen werden. Erlaubt sind Handykameras, einfache Digitalkameras und GoPros. Spiegelreflexkameras und DSLRs sind nur mit Genehmigung zugelassen. Diese kann bei foto@holifestival.com angefordert werden. Da uns die Umwelt und eure Gesundheit am Herzen liegt, lassen wir nur getestetes und geprüftes Pulver zu, das ihr auf dem Gelände kaufen könnt. Um das gewährleisten zu können, ist das Mitbringen von Pulver nicht erlaubt. 
Ist meine Registrierung/mein Ticket übertragbar?
Ja, die Tickets sind übertragbar.
Muss ich das ausgedruckte Ticket mitbringen?
Ja, das Ticket muss in ausgedruckter Form mitgebracht werden. 
Wie sehen die Rückerstattungsbedingungen aus?
Ein Rückerstattung ist leider nicht möglich, allerdings können Tickets im privaten Rahmen weitergegeben werden. 
Der Name auf der Registrierung/dem Ticket stimmt nicht mit dem Namen des Teilnehmers überein. Ist das ein Problem?
Nein, das ist kein Problem. Man kommt auch mit einem Ticket rein, auf dem ein anderer Name steht.

Portland's premier Pop-Culture Event.  
Locally produced with an emphasis on an all inclusive event for everyone including:

Comics, comics creators and the creative process
Gaming
Sci-Fi
Cosplay
Anime
Fantasy
and everything in between

Learn More at: rosecitycomiccon.com
 
FAQs
 How do I receive my badge and merchandise that I ordered?
For orders placed by 7/15/16 11:59pm PT, the badges and merchandise will be mailed to the address specified as the "Shipping Address" in the order form. 
For Orders placed after 7/15/16, the badges and merchandise must be picked up at the event in Ticketing Hall A of the Oregon Convention Center, 777 NE Martin Luther King Jr Blvd,  Portland, OR 97232
You will need a printed copy of the order confirmation or a copy of the email on your smart phone. 

Is my registration/ticket transferrable?
Yes, tickets are 100% transferrable. 
 
What is the refund policy?
Refunds are allowed up to 60 days before the event.  
Click here for instructions on how to get a refund. 

Where can I contact the organizer with any questions?
Please visit our website: RoseCityComicCon.Com  for a comprehensive review of the event, additional FAQs and contact list.

description.text:
Destination Star Trek returns in 2016 for a VERY special anniversary.  Join us in Birmingham this October to celebrate 50 years of Star Trek, yes 50 years of seeking out new life and new civilisations and to keep boldly going where no one has gone before!
Set to be Europe's biggest Star Trek celebration, Destination Star Trek Europe will offer fans the opportunity to meet the cast and crew, explore interactive exhibits, learn about Star Trek’s impact on science, space and technology, and enjoy parties fit for a golden anniversary.

name.text: Unity Christian Music Festival - August 2016 www.unitymusicfestival.com
name.html: Unity Christian Music Festival - August 2016 www.unitymusicfestival.com

description.text:
Four days of the best in Christian Music.  Starts off with our free Day Zero concert event on Wednesday, August 10 followed by full-event festival days on Thursday, August 11 - Saturday, August 13.
No refunds or exchanges.  Tickets are non-refundable - Rain or Shine.
This site is for general admission sales only.  A very limited amount of reserved seating tickets are available by calling 231-773-3361 from 8:30 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. Monday - Thursday.
Kids 5 and under are free!
All kid's activities all three days are free!
Extreme games all three days are free!
Full event details available at www.unitymusicfestival.com
If you need more information about Unity, you may call 231-773-3361 from 9 - 4 Monday - Thursday.
1. How will we know if when, where and even if specific artists will be signing autographs and selling merchandise?
It is totally up to the discretion of performers and artists if they will be available for public meetings and signings. The performers are under no obligation to participate in these types of activities. Historically most Unity artists do meet with the public in the merchandise tent after their time on stage. Because we have no idea if artists will or will not participate, there will be no advance announcement. If you are interested in meeting with a specific artist, go to the main merchandise tent after they have completed their time on stage and check with merchandise volunteers.
2. Are coolers allowed at Unity?
Due to changes in security and insurance rules, coolers are no longer allowed inside the festival grounds. Bags are subject to inspection at any time. Even though coolers are not allowed, we hope it will not cause a major inconvenience. Our family friendly prices are a crowd pleaser and much easier than lugging your cooler around anyway.
3. How do I contact “Alive on the Lakeshore” Board members or Unity organizing committee members?
The best way to reach us is by emailing: kevin@unitychristianevents.com.
Alternatively, you can reach us by calling 231-773-3361, Monday through Friday from 9 am til 5 pm.
4. How does my band apply to play at Unity?
Each year we host a talent search competition for new bands. Detail are typically posted on the website in late Fall or early Winter. Please check back at www.unitymusicfestival.com for details on how and where to apply.  Due to volume, the festival is not able to respond to emails, packages or links that are sent to us directly during the year.
5. Is there handicap seating and parking available at Unity?
We have developed a special Unity Festival Handicap Parking and Access policy to help communicate our commitment to serving the special needs of Unity participates.
6. What time do the gates open / when will I be able to get into the festival?
Wednesday gates open at 4:00 p.m. (free Day Zero event)Thursday, Friday and Saturday gates open at 1:00 p.m.
7. How do I know who is performing at Unity this year? I read listings on the iTickets.com website…are those “official”?
The information on the Bands In Town app and on iTickets.com and other third-party websites are sometimes out-of-date and even completely erroneous.  For up-to-date information on who is performing at the festival, please check out our event schedule pages
8. Are cameras allowed at Unity?
Our agreements with the artists and their management restricts the types of allowed cameras on the grounds. Only small, snapshot type cameras are allowed on the grounds. Any commercial cameras or cameras with interchangeable lenses will be confiscated upon entry and returned upon exiting. Any media representatives or commercial photographers must obtain credentials BEFORE the event by contacting the media and marketing coordinator.
9. What is the Unity Christian Music Festival?
The Unity Christian Music Festival is a for day festival, focused on the best in Christian music, but also including great food, fellowship and family fun!
10. Why was the Unity Festival started?
The festival was started to bring Christians together for public praise, worship and fellowship; to provide a wholesome, family valued entertainment alternative and to raise funds and recruit volunteers for area Christian ministries.
11. Who puts the Unity Festival together?
The Festival is presented by Alive on the Lakeshore, a volunteer group of local Christians who want to present wholesome, Christ centered, family valued entertainment options in West Michigan.
12. Will there be seats or chairs? Or do we need to bring our own blankets and chairs? 
There are no chairs or seats provided in the main concert stage areas – However, you are free to bring your own lawn chairs or blankets to sit on during the events! Effective 2013: Tarps are no longer allowed on concert grounds.
13. No weapons are allowed on the Unity Grounds

Boston Comic Con 2016: New England's biggest and best comic book convention.1. CELEBRITY PHOTO OP TICKETS will go on sale at a later date to be announced.
2. CELEBRITY AUTOGRAPHS will go on sale at a later date to be announced.
3. Show Hours:  Friday -  August 12, 2016 (12pm to 8pm)Saturday - August 13, 2016 (10am to 7pm)Sunday -  August  14, 2016 (10am to 6pm)
*VIP Ticket Holders will be admitted to the show 30 minutes early each day.4.  At the door ticket sales will only be available if the event has not been sold out, and will be sold at a premium over online ticket prices. 5. Event details can be found at on the Boston Comic Con website.  Click here. 6. Children 10 and under are free on Friday and do not need a ticket.  Children age 5 and under are free on Saturday and Sunday and do not need a ticket.7.  Purchased tickets are e-mailed to the purchaser by Eventbrite.  Tickets can either be printed out or shown on a smart phone at the show.  Hard copy tickets are NOT mailed to the purchaser.8.  Refund Policy:  Any ticket refund requests must be submitted by no later than Thursday 5pm EST August 11, 2016.  Refund requests after that date will not be considered for any reason whatsoever. 9. In order to request a refund please follow these instructions: Use Request a Refund from your Order Details. After logging in, go to your Current Orders by clicking My Tickets. When you find the order you want to refund and click on it, look for a button to Request a Refund and fill out the short contact form. When you're done writing your message, just click Send message and your message will be sent directly to the event organizer. Thank you.

description.text:
Rainbow Serpent Festival has been on a wonderful journey over the last two decades.  From a small gathering in a secluded clearing Rainbow has developed into one of the most highly regarded music and arts festivals in the world.  These days the epic five day multifaceted explosion of dance, colour, expression and celebration attracts people from all over the planet who converge on Lexton in Western Victoria in January for an unforgettable, unique Australian experience.
We would like to extend a warm invitation to come and join us for our 20th Anniversary Celebration!  It will come as no surprise we intend for Rainbow 2017 to be a momentous celebration of world class music producers and DJs, beautiful art and sculpture with inspiring speakers and workshops.
We will look back at the incredible journey we've all taken together while enjoying an unprecedented weekend of activities, opportunities, moments and memories.  With world class décor, roving artistic performances, crazy activities you can’t imagine a more exotic sensory mix. If you’ve never been to the Rainbow Serpent Festival, now is the time to buy a tent and call your friends.
The name Rainbow Serpent is distinctly Australian, coming from the Dreamtime creation story told by the traditional owners of the land. Dreamtime stories often vary between aboriginal tribes, however the story of the Rainbow Serpent is special as it is one of the few common to all.  To keep informed of announcements and updated line-ups please go to our website at www.rainbowserpent.net

description.text:
Allt tyder nu på att det är köpläge. Räntan är låg och fastighetspriserna har sjunkit på 
många håll i världen.
Sedan 13 år tillbaka arrangerar Fair Media International AB fastighetsmässor i Norden 
för köp av bostäder utomlands.
Nästa mässa i Stockholm blir den 24-25 september 2016. 
Mässan äger rum på Kistamässan.
Mässorna är en marknadsplats för utställare från hela världen som 
vill marknadsföra sina bostäder till kvalificerade köpare. 
Våra utställare på mässorna kommer från över 20 olika länder
och består av agenter, fastighetsmäklare och byggmästare  
samt andra företag som har med ämnesområdet att göra.
Vi arrangerar olika seminarier som är helt gratis för allmänheten. 
I mässbroschyren ges också information om seminarierna som 
kommer att presenteras och vilka som är seminarieföreläsare. 
Normalt hålls seminarier om olika populära länder i hela världen 
samt speciella seminarier om skattekonsekvenser vid köp av 
bostad utomlands, pensionering utomlandsoch 
lånemöjligheter vid köp av bostad utomlands.

description.text:
Thank you for purchasing your 2016 Men's Tickets! PLEASE READ ALL INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE CONTINUING.
The Men's 2016 Season Pass includes parking and entry at all regular season home games for the Silverbacks Men's team. Once you've purchased your season pass, you will receive a confirmation email with instructions.
GROUP TICKETS: After purchase, please contact us at lori.garcia@atlantasilverbacks.com to receive appropriate game tickets.
Game tickets will be emailed to you at a later date, closer to season start.
Download the Eventbrite App on your mobile device and sign in with your same email address. All your game tickets will be visible and only the appropriate ticket will be valid for each game.
Game tickets will appear in your account through the App. NO PRINTED TICKETS ARE NECESSARY AT THE GATE IF YOU HAVE THE APP.
To keep lines moving quickly, use the Eventbrite App at the gate and scan your tickets.
The Silverbacks Men's season starts May 14th, and all Home Games are currently scheduled for June. The Silverbacks Women's season details will be out soon. Please see www.atlantasilverbacksfc.com for details.
 
FAQs
Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event?
Please present tickets in the Eventbrite app.  If forgotten you may check in with picture ID to confirm your order. 
What are my transport/parking options getting to the event?
Parking is $5 cash at the park. 
What can/can't I bring to the event?
No alcohol or firearms permitted. 
Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event?
Please download the Eventbrite app on your mobile device to present your tickets at the gate. 
What is the refund policy?
No refunds.

description.text:
We look forward to seeing you in New Orleans for Tales of the Cocktail®, the world's premier cocktail festival.
Registration beginning on Tuesday, July 19th through Friday, July 22nd from 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM in the Hotel Monteleone (214 Royal Street) in Royal Ballrooms A & B. 
Click here for FAQs
 
NEW IN 2016
 

RFID technology will be implemented throughout the festival using RFID wristband and scanners at tasting room and seminar doors.
Each attendee will receive a complimentary Attendee RFID wristband (an online promotion) upon purchasing $150 in tickets through Eventbrite.
The RFID wristband will be your attendee credential, which gives you access into all tasting rooms and most branded seminars. Tickets must be purchased for access to seminars and/or special events.
If you complete your purchase before June 16, 2016, your Attendee RFID wristband will be mailed to you. If you completed your purchase after June 16, 2016, you must pick up your Attendee RFID wristband on site at Registration. International attendees must pick up their Attendee RFID wristband at registration. We will not ship outside of the U.S. or Canada.Registration is located at our host hotel, Hotel Monteleone (214 Royal Street) in the Royal Ballrooms A & B, beginning Tuesday, July 19th through Friday, July 22nd from 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM. Registration will be closed Saturday, July 23rd and Sunday, July 24th.

NOTE: If you lose, or damage your RFID wristband, you will be charged $250 for a replacement RFID wristband.


All attendees will need to come through registration to activate their Attendee RFID wristband, whether you have pre-registered it online or registering on site.
The complimentary Attendee RFID wristband promotion will end when online ticket sales will end, Monday, July 11, 2016 at 11:59 PM PST. Tickets will not be sold at registration. Tickets will be sold at the seminar door, space permitting, but will not qualify you to receive a complimentary RFID wristband.

JETZT FAN WERDEN: https://www.facebook.com/HoliFestivalOfColoursBerlin✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫✫LINE-UP 2016:
▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼▼
TOPICLE SHUUKHONKAIZZY TRIXXDJ DENSOLIVER MAGENTAPINJUHOST: SOLA PLEXUS
LOCATION:
Reiterstadion Olympiapark
Seit wir 2012 das erste Holi Festival of Colours weltweit mit unserem Konzept veranstalten - sind wir nun mittlerweile in über 20 Ländern aktiv und haben lange überlegt, was wir euch 2016 neues bieten wollen.Lange haben wir mit großen Firmen zusammen getüftelt: und werden euch nächstes Jahr eine in Deutschland einmalige, noch nie dagewesene BOMBASTISCHE BÜHNE mit entsprechend eindrucksvoller SHOW bieten! Jeder kennt sie von Fotos und Videos: die unglaublichen Stages vom Tomorrowland & Co. Wir werden euch mit einer unglaublichen Kulisse von den Socken hauen!Seid also DABEI wenn es wieder heißt: 3...2...1..: FARBE!!
-----2012 ging durch UNS das große Farben-Werfen los. Wir brachten das Holi Festival Of Colours nach Deutschland! Wollt ihr wissen, wie alles begann? Hier gibt es Impressionen der letzten Holi Festival Of Colours aus dem letzten Jahr, die Lust auf die nächsten Festivals machen:www.HOLIFESTIVAL.com
Der Rückblick 2015:
Den ganzen Sommer und Winter über tourten wir durch fast alle europäischen Länder, sowie VAE, Peru, Lebanon, Chile, Panama, Südafrika, Argentinien, Mexiko, El-Salvador, Australien usw. und haben uns von Show zu Show gesteigert - so dass wir jetzt, nach knapp 1.200.000 Besuchern - euch 2016 eine wahrhaft UNVERGESSLICHE, EINDRUCKSVOLLE SHOW mit neuer Story, riesiger Stage, bombastischer Tageseffekt-Show bieten werden. Seid gespannt und freut euch auf ein einmaliges Erlebnis!
 
FAQs
Muss ich mich am Einlass ausweisen oder gibt es eine Altersbeschränkung für das Event?
Das Festival is ab 16 Jahren. Auch in Begleitung eines Erwachsenen haben unter 16-Jährige keinen Zutritt. Bitte einen Ausweiß mitbringen, da am Einlass kontrolliert wird. 
Was kann ich zum Event mitbringen und was nicht?
Eigene Speisen und Getränke dürfen leider nicht mit auf das Konzertgelände genommen werden. Erlaubt sind Handykameras, einfache Digitalkameras und GoPros. Spiegelreflexkameras und DSLRs sind nur mit Genehmigung zugelassen. Diese kann bei foto@holifestival.com angefordert werden. Da uns die Umwelt und eure Gesundheit am Herzen liegt, lassen wir nur getestetes und geprüftes Pulver zu, das ihr auf dem Gelände kaufen könnt. Um das gewährleisten zu können, ist das Mitbringen von Pulver nicht erlaubt. 
Ist meine Registrierung/mein Ticket übertragbar?
Ja, die Tickets sind übertragbar.
Muss ich das ausgedruckte Ticket mitbringen?
Ja, das Ticket muss in ausgedruckter Form mitgebracht werden. 
Wie sehen die Rückerstattungsbedingungen aus?
Ein Rückerstattung ist leider nicht möglich, allerdings können Tickets im privaten Rahmen weitergegeben werden. 
Der Name auf der Registrierung/dem Ticket stimmt nicht mit dem Namen des Teilnehmers überein. Ist das ein Problem?
Nein, das ist kein Problem. Man kommt auch mit einem Ticket rein, auf dem ein anderer Name steht.

name.text: CNO Financial Indianapolis Monumental Marathon,  Half Marathon, 5k and Kids Fun Run,   November 5, 2016 8:00 a.m.
name.html: CNO Financial Indianapolis Monumental Marathon,  Half Marathon, 5k and Kids Fun Run,   November 5, 2016 8:00 a.m.

description.text:
Now one of the 20 largest marathons in the U.S., the CNO Financial Indianapolis Monumental Marathon is the ideal fall marathon for everyone from the first time marathon runner to elite athletes.  Starting and finishing at the Indiana State Capitol, the course highlights landmarks and historical neighborhoods throughout Indianapolis.  Nationally recognized as flat and fast, the event has hosted Olympians, PR seekers, and thousands of Boston Marathon qualifers. 
Event Highlights:

Marathon sells out annually
Flat, Fast Half Marathon - one of the fastest growing in the USA
5k featuring Monumental Kids Movement, the IMM's youth running program that educates Indianapolis youth on the benefits of exercise, proper diet and healthy living
Health & Fitness Expo with expo speakers, vendors & more

Don’t wait to register to #BeMonumental on November 5, 2016! 
Indianapolis – A Beautiful Place to Set Your Pace!

Don't forget your Monumental Merchandise when registering!
